about.title: Mission
about.description: Our mission is to enable businesses to thrive in the digital world with the help of our cutting-edge innovative and impactful social media marketing creatives and top-notch customer support.

about.title: Vision
about.description: Our vision is to become the #1 social media creative agency, recognized for our passion, and creativity for delivering impactful creatives that engage the audience and generate results for the client.

about.title: Value
about.description: We value creativity, transparency, and teamwork. We strive to provide definite results for our clients through effective social media creatives because we strongly believe in the power of innovation.

faq.title: How Many Clients Have You Worked With?
How Are You Different from Other Social Media Creative Agencies?
faq.description: We stand out from other social media creative agencies by offering a tailored approach and comprehensive designs for clients based on their needs. The agency takes a personalized approach to understanding each business's unique goals and creates plans based on them.

faq.title: What Budgets Do You Typically Work With?
faq.description: We typically work with a wide range of budgets, from small businesses with limited resources to large corporations with significant marketing budgets. We understand that each business has unique needs and constraints regarding social media marketing—that's why we offer customizable packages tailored to meet each business's specific needs. We usually begin our retainers with a budget of $150/â‚¹7000 per month.

faq.title: How Often Will You Post on Social Media?
faq.description: Creatives will be posted in accordance with the strategy you choose. We may also create unique plans based on the needs of your creatives.

faq.title: How much time is required for the design to be completed?
faq.description: It depends upon the type of creative design required. We take 24-48 hours to submit a plan based on the inputs required by the Client

faq.title: Is the Client involved in the design phase?
faq.description: Clients can share reference samples they like, and during the design phase, we send the creatives designed to the Client for approval. Iteration 1-2 times will be done per client advice; after that, it will cost additional based on the hours invested.

faq.title: Will the work be affected if you are in another Country?
faq.description: No, we connect through Skype and Whatsapp and update the Client on progress.

faq.title: Which Format will the creatives be shared in?
faq.description: The specific Format in which a social media creative agency shares creatives may vary depending on the client's needs and the platforms being used. However, social media creatives can generally be shared in various formats, including images, videos, GIFs, infographics, and more.

faq.title: What Metrics Should I Measure in Social Media?
faq.description:
You should measure the following key metrics:
  • Engagement rates, such as likes, comments, and shares.
  • Reach and impressions measure the number of people who have seen a post or ad.
  • Click-through rates show how many people clicked on a link or call to action.
  • Conversion rates measure the percentage of people who took a desired action, such as filling out a form or purchasing.
  • Customer acquisition cost calculates how much it costs to acquire each new customer through social media.

faq.title: Why Should I Invest in Social Media Marketing?
faq.description:
Investing in social media marketing can help businesses in:
  • Reach a vast audience,
  • Connect with specific groups of people,
  • Build brand awareness, and
  • Establish a strong online presence.
It can be a cost-effective way to reach a large audience, and businesses can generate organic reach by posting valuable content. Social media marketing can be a powerful tool for business growth and success.
